Performance:
February 1978: The Crossroads of Gappo

Production: February 1978

Play: The Crossroads of Gappo (摂州合邦辻)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Gappo's House (合邦庵室 / Gappō anjitsu)

Characters:

Tamate-Gozen (Tamate Gozen / 玉手御前)

Shuntokumaru (Takayasu Shuntokumaru / 高安俊徳丸)

Heima (Tsuboi Heima / 壺井平馬)

Zusho (Zusho / 桟図書)

Irihei, a servant (Yakko Irihei / 奴入平)

Gappo (Gappō Dōshin / 合邦道心 (親合邦))

Asakahime (Asaka Hime / 浅香姫)

Gappo's wife (Gappō nyōbō / 合邦女房)

Jiromaru (Takayasu Jirōmaru / 高安次郎丸)
